body_html:
Please see the new tf.nn.raw_rnn, which allows you to keep an arbitrary list of tensors and TensorArrays in the loop_state, as passed through loop_fn.

You can write the rnn output state to your loop state.
body_text:
Please see the new tf.nn.raw_rnn, which allows you to keep an arbitrary list of tensors and TensorArrays in the loop_state, as passed through loop_fn.
You can write the rnn output state to your loop state.
body:
Please see the new `tf.nn.raw_rnn`, which allows you to keep an arbitrary list of tensors and TensorArrays in the loop_state, as passed through loop_fn.

You can write the rnn output state to your loop state.
